title: 7 Days to Die Alpha 4 x64 Multiplayer Crack
description:
This is a Multiplayer Crack for 7 Days to Die Alpha 4, version x64

You can download the game from here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9243730/7_Days_to_Die_-_Alpha_4_ORIGINAL_UNMODDED_FILES_64bit


Installing:
Drop the "Assembly-CSharp.dll" into "[Game Folder]7DaysToDie_DataManaged" and replace it.

HowTo:
- After opening the game, write the Username and Password you would like to use, don't forget the password if you want to keep your username, there is no way to retrieve it.
- Server list is a List of CRACKED servers, maintained by you guys.

Making a server:
- When creating a server set it as "Public" and it will show up in the list.

Info:
In the server list the "Refresh" button has been disabled because the forged server I am using is extremely slow, if you want to update the server list click "Back" then again in "Connect To Server".



Enjoy the crack, I spend a bit of time working on it!

Also if you really like the game, you should buy it ;)
